xwikidoc.content: === Join Planet Sankor√© === [[Create a new account>>Main.JoinCurriki||id = "signup"]] (% class = "disc inside"%) * To create open educational resources * To share under creative commons * To create clusters * To participate in communities of interest (% class = "disc inside"%) ** by country ** by discipline ** by grade * To evaluate the free resources published * To write your blog and spread * To participate in the palms of the digital
